sense.def:
Z izrazom
hardly
povemo, da je nekaj komaj še resnično.

seg.quote: I was beginning to like Sam, though I hardly knew him.
The boy was hardly more than seventeen.
Her bedroom was so small that she could hardly move in it.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da
hardly had one thing happened when something else happened
, hočemo povedati, da je prvemu dogodku takoj sledil drugi.

seg.quote: Hardly had he uttered the words when he began laughing.

sense.def:
Izraz
hardly
lahko uporabimo v porogljivem pomenu, da poudarimo, kadar nekaj prav gotovo ni res.

seg.quote: In the circumstances, it is hardly surprising that he resigned.
